thread.title: Video: AKA walks out on an interview over Bonang Matheba affair
thread.title_full: Video: AKA walks out on an interview over Bonang Matheba affair

title: Video: AKA walks out on an interview over Bonang Matheba affair
text:
Date: 08-10-2015 Time: 06:10:11:pm AKA 
South African rapper AKA recently walked out on an interview over a controversial question after stating ‘controversy is like my comfort zone’. 
In a recent interview with News24, when asked to respond to allegations of an affair between himself and presenter Bonang Matheba, the South African superstar got up, took his mic off and asked to speak with his management off camera. 
Watch what happened towards the end of the interview in the video below:
